hero_section.title: A Revolutionary New School That Invests in You
hero_section.description: Lambda School is a 9 month, immersive program that gives you the tools and training you need to launch your new career—from the comfort of your own home.

list1.title: Live Classes From Anywhere
list1.subtitle: Take live, structured classes from the convenience of wherever, with instant, one-on-one help whenever you need it.

list2.title: World-Class Instructional Staff
list2.subtitle: We built a curriculum with hands-on, real-world experience taught by instructors from Google, Apple, Blizzard, and more.

list3.title: Pay Nothing Until You Make It
list3.subtitle: No loans, no debt, and no up-front tuition. You'll pay a percentage of income after you're hired, but only if you're making at least $50k/year.

section2.title: An Education That Banks On You
section2.description: We believe that education should invest in you, not the other way around. As a Lambda student, you pay nothing until you’re earning $50k or more. And if you don’t, it’s free.
section2.img_text: I never thought I was the type that could land a high-paying tech job, but I just accepted a high-paying job as a software engineer. And I haven’t paid Lambda School anything so far.

section3.title: Lambda, Live From Anywhere
section3.description: Lambda classes happen live, every weekday from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Pacific. The rigorous curriculum is designed to provide the real-world, career-oriented skills you'll need in a future career, as well as instant, one-on-one help whenever you need it.

section4.title: Not Your Average Instructors. Not Your Average Students.
section4.description: Lambda School's instructional staff hail from the top companies and universities in the world.

section5.title: Are you an international applicant?
section5.description: Lambda School is currently available in the United States and the European Union. If you are interested in being informed when Lambda School is available in your country, please fill out the form at the link below.

section6.title: Meet Some of our Industry Partners
section6.description: When you succeed, so do we. We partner with some of the best technology companies in the world to advise us on curriculum, help certify our students for graduation from Lambda School, and get warm introductions to our students that are ready for jobs.

section7.title: Real Applications, Real Teams
section7.description: You'll build production-ready applications on actual software development teams, simulating and training for the environment you'll have when you enter the workforce. When you land that job you'll show up ready to ship code on day one.

section8.title: Lambda School Tracks
section8.description: Lambda School invests in you by training you for the careers of the future at no up-front cost.

list1.title: Full-Stack Web & Computer Science
list1.payment1: $0 up-front + 17% of income for two years (only if you're making $50k+)
list1.sched: Schedule: Monday-Friday 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. Pacific
list1.topics: Topics: Software engineering, web development and computer science
